author: Steve Adcock
title: This 38-year-old retired in the Arizona desert with his wife: How coronavirus changed life in early retirement
description: You'd think that, for a couple who retired in their 30s and moved to small town of about 2,200 people, the coronavirus pandemic has probably not affected them all that much. That's not entirely true.
content:
Social distancing brought us closer
Around 2016, after setting aside 70% of our tech salaries, my wife Courtney and I quit our jobs and retired early in Tucson, Arizona. 
But just last year, we had to get acclimated to our new retirement setup: an 800-squar… [+5396 chars]
